title: go.tools/go/types: shadowed package scope problem
body:
by **leterip**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. http://play.golang.org/p/L4oWaAvRwM

What is the expected output?
SSA works properly

What do you see instead?
using pythia:

/Users/jeff/test/otest/src/otest/otest.go:11:8: invalid operation: fmt (variable of type
*otest.T) has no field or method Println
/Users/jeff/test/otest/src/otest/otest.go:3:8: "fmt" imported but not used

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
darwin

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go1.2 + whatever go get gets on go.tools

Please provide any additional information below.
This is about as minimal as I can get the test case. Pretty neat.
